content: the **mosaic ridge child-size crochet pullover** is perfect for all the little ones in your life this adorable sweater is crocheted with a circular yoke and simple mosaic stitches just like the adult version making it fun to create and delightful to wear its cozy fit and simple eye-catching design makes it ideal for keeping your little ones warm and stylish this sweater pattern comes with a video tutorial crochet hook 4 5mm 1 - or size to meet gauge notions removable stitch markers 2 yarn needle to weave in ends 3 scissors 4 yarn mary maxim mellowspun 5 100% acrylic 284yds/100g color a shown in white or sand mary maxim prism 6 100% acrylic 290yds/100g color b shown in autumn mist or sunset yardage total yardage 345 385 425 475 525 590 650 745 845 945 main color a yardage 283 315 348 390 430 460 505 580 660 735 2 2 2 2 2 2 2 3 3 3 skeins accent color b yardage 62 70 77 85 95 130 145 165 185 210 1 skein each color yarn substitutions wecrochet swish 7 100% fine superwash merino wool 110yds/50g premier basix dk yarn 8 100% acrylic 306yds/100g premier colorfusion dk yarn 9 100% acrylic 325yds/100g abbreviations blo - back loop only chain - chain double_crochet - double_crochet ehdc - extended half_double_crochet ehdc2tog - extended half_double_crochet two together round - round single_crochet - single_crochet slip_stitch - slip_stitch st s - stitch es gauge 15 sts and 16 row = 4 by 4 worked in the overlay mosaic pattern 15 sts and 10 row = 4 by 4 worked in the ehdc not sure what gauge is check out this blog post what is crochet gauge and how to fix it 10 sizes newborn baby 9 mo 1y 2y 4y 6y 8y 10y 12y to fit chest 15 16 17 18 21 23 25 26 5 28 30 actual measurements 16 17 5 19 25 20 25 23 5 24 75 26 5 28 75 29 75 32 this garment has an oversized relaxed fit and is meant to be worn with a 2-4 inch ease for a more fitted look go down a size skill level intermediate let s be friends on social media website http //www brianakdesigns com/ 11 instagram https //www instagram com/brianakdesigns/ 12 facebook https //www facebook com/brianakdesigns/ 13 community group https //www facebook com/groups/brianak/ 14 pinterest https //www pinterest com/brianakdesigns/boards/ 15 youtube ht 16 tps //www youtube com/channel/ucvqxin8ot3ndwb40iamipsw when sharing projects on social media i love to see them please use #brianakdesigns it is much appreciated and loved © 2024 designed by briana kepner briana k designs all rights reserved this design the pattern and the images are the property of briana k designs the buyer may use this pattern for personal use and sales of finished items are also permitted credit given to briana k designs is not only greatly appreciated but smiled upon no part of this document may be reproduced altered or
